biography.title: My Biography
biography.desc: I am Loïc Noro, a passionate IT student currently in the Pre-MSc program at Epitech. After a BTS SIO (SLAM), I strengthened my skills in software development, web technologies, and project management. I enjoy working on both front-end and back-end, with an interest in object-oriented programming, databases, and software engineering. I also completed a two-month Erasmus internship in Malta, improving my adaptability and international professional experience.
